plot: The rivalry between two women who are trying to snare him into a marriage promise sends a man out in the middle of a typhoon to escape them. It is not until years later that either women makes any effort to discover what became of him.
title: Sanyuha
plot_es: The rivalry between two women who are trying to snare him into a marriage promise sends a man out in the middle of a typhoon to escape them. It is not until years later that either women makes any effort to discover what became of him.
